title: Engine bearing manufacture
creator_credit: Cine Service and Repco Engine Parts Group Technical Film
brief_description: The processes involved in the manufacture of bearings and bushes for all types of automobiles are explained. The works are in Tasmania and 600 different types of bearing sets are produced. The trade is not only within Australia, orders are received from the East. Africa, USA and Germany.
